A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I created this account just so I could post a review for this movie.

Ive been a star wars fan since I was a small child and now approaching middle age I am sorry to say the movie franchise I used to love is now a complete joke.

The last Jedi is a big FU to fans. My biggest gripe with the movie is the portrayal of Luke Skywalker. He was supposed to be the greatest hero of modern mythology but this\,movie makes him a sad punchline.   The new hero Rey is completely unbelievable  as a character due to somehow being the more powerful than any Jedi without any training or backstory.  Also it was an awful decision to kill off a potentially great villain so early . The plot meanders and really doesn't do the franchise justice. 

Star Wars is a fantasy and the lore that was created in the previous movies is completely subverted by this one.  Its a real let down. I wont ever pay to see another star wars movie.
